content.rendered:
GEOKC Campaigns Team

Introduction of the Teams:

Team One

Name – GEOKC Charitable Fundraiser
For – GEOKC Campaigns
Purpose – To Meet the Fundraising Goal

Areas of Fundraising:

  • GEOKC Campaigns
  • GEOKC Annual Fund
  • Major Gifts & Planned Giving
  • Endowment Fund
  • Tribute Gifts
  • Other Giving Sevas:
    • Daan Peti Sevas
    • Gift-in-Kind
  • GEOKC Special Events
  • Membership Campaign
  • GEOKC Yearly Campaign

Team Two

Name – GEOKC Charitable Fundraiser
For – GEOKC Programs
Purpose – To Meet the Fundraising Goal

Areas of Fundraising:

  • All Activities with Fees
  • Pretti Bhoj Sponsorship
  • Tulsi & Flower Sponsorship

Team Three

612-540-9651
batheja.sunita@gmail.com

All GEOKC Capital Campaign Donations are followed by Team Three:

Name – GEOKC New Building Project World Fundraising Meet-ups
For – GEOKC Capital Campaign
Purpose – To Meet the Fundraising Goal of GEOKC Building Projects

Our plan is to make a worldwide respected and dedicated Hindu community with its supporters:

  • GEOKC Pujya Guruji and All Gurus Blessing
  • GEOKC Campaigns Staff
  • GEOKC Campaigns Volunteers
  • GEOKC Fundraising Committee
  • Capital Campaign Committee:
    • Capital Campaign Planning Sketch
    • Capital Campaign Leadership
  • Gift Seeking Goal
  • Time Length to Meet the Funding Needs of GEOKC Capital Campaign
  • Proceeding to Building Construction

GEOKC Campaigns Team also manages GEOKC events fundraising areas, and is called:

GEOKC Event Fundraising Team

Name – GEOKC Charitable Fundraiser
For – GEOKC Events
Purpose – To Meet the Fundraising Goal

Areas of Fundraising:

  • GEOKC Vaishnava Events
  • Ashram Events
  • Multi-Purposes Events
